author: James Van Straten, AI Boost
title: Crypto Soared in May as Institutions, States, and Regulators Embrace Bitcoin: Ikigai's Kling
description: Massive treasury allocations, regulatory breakthroughs, and strategic acquisitions pushed bitcoin to new highs.
content:
